Uses of Package
com.textmagic.sms.dto

Packages that use com.textmagic.sms.dto
com.textmagic.sms   
com.textmagic.sms.core.parsing   
com.textmagic.sms.dto   
 

Classes in com.textmagic.sms.dto used by com.textmagic.sms
MessageStatus
          The data transfer object MessageStatus is representation of message delivering status.
PhoneInfo
          Data transfer object PhoneInfo provides information about phone number, i.e. the country phone registered in and price of single message to this destination
ReceivedMessage
          The data transfer object ReceivedMessage is representation of inbound sms messages received by server.
SentMessage
          The data transfer object SentMessage is the servers representation of sms message being sent by clients through TextMagic Gateway.
 

Classes in com.textmagic.sms.dto used by com.textmagic.sms.core.parsing
MessageStatus
          The data transfer object MessageStatus is representation of message delivering status.
PhoneInfo
          Data transfer object PhoneInfo provides information about phone number, i.e. the country phone registered in and price of single message to this destination
ReceivedMessage
          The data transfer object ReceivedMessage is representation of inbound sms messages received by server.
SentMessage
          The data transfer object SentMessage is the servers representation of sms message being sent by clients through TextMagic Gateway.
 

Classes in com.textmagic.sms.dto used by com.textmagic.sms.dto
Message
          The data transfer object Message is the base representation of all sms message objects being passed between TextMagic server and its clients.
MessageStatus.DeliveryState
          DeliveryState is used to indicate current state of messages being sent through the TextMagic gateway In addition, enum provide 2 attributes: isFinal - if isFinal is false, this means message delivering is in progress, otherwise delivering ended description - user friendly message text explaining current state
